dublin_core.dcvalue: The m4Change project launched the conditional cash transfer (CCT) scheme in 2014; this system incentivizes mothers to attend maternal health services, as well as tracks patients to ensure continued care is provided.

Marion McNabb, Senior Technical Advisor, Pathfinder International, Email: mmcnabb@pathfinder.org; Farouk Jega, Pathfinder Nigeria Country Representative, Pathfinder International, Email: fjega@pathfinder.org
Kaduna and Abuja/Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria
Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Financial transactions and incentives, Provider work planning and scheduling, Maternal health
